short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy tool to audit your Google Shopping performance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply input your Google Ads account ID, and after an easy, one-time OAuth setup, our tool will provide you with valuable insights. We'll calculate how much of your budget is allocated to products that generate zero value.
